result.html: Cosnaíonn sé seacht bpuntIt costs seven pounds.
result.ponchtml: Cosnaíonn sé seaċt bpuntIt costs seven pounds.

result.eng: She started going to school when she was seven years of age.
result.ga: Thosaigh sí ag dul ar scoil nuair a bhí sí seacht mbliana d'aois
result.orig: Thosaigh sí ag dul ar scoil nuair a bhí sí seacht mbliana d'aois
result.html: Thosaigh sí ag dul ar scoil nuair a bhí sí seacht mbliana d'aoisShe started going to school when she was seven years of age.
result.ponchtml: Ṫosaiġ sí ag dul ar scoil nuair a ḃí sí seaċt mbliana d'aoisShe started going to school when she was seven years of age.

result.eng: We expect the train at seven o'clock.
result.ga: Tá muid ag súil leis an traein ag a seacht a chlog
result.orig: Tá muid ag súil leis an traein ag a seacht a chlog
result.html: Tá muid ag súil leis an traein ag a seacht a chlogWe expect the train at seven o'clock.
result.ponchtml: Tá muid ag súil leis an traein ag a seaċt a ċlogWe expect the train at seven o'clock.

result.eng: News is [usually] available at seven o'clock on TG4 also.
result.ga: Bíonn nuacht le fáil ag a seacht a chlog ar TG4 freisin

result.ponchtml: Bíonn nuaċt le fáil ag a seaċt a ċlog ar TG4 freisinNews is [usually] available at seven o'clock on TG4 also.

result.ga: Tá sé seacht gcéad euro sa mí

result.eng: Eimear is seven years (old) and Dara is ten years (old).
result.ga: Tá Eimear seacht mbliana agus tá Dara deich mbliana

result.eng: I eat my dinner between seven and eight.

result.eng: Do you eat your dinner at seven?

result.eng: She starts working at 7.30 in the morning and finishes at 11.00 at night seven days a week.
result.ga: Tosaíonn sí ag obair ag 7 30 ar maidin agus críochnaíonn sí ag 11 00 istoíche seacht lá in aghaidh na seachtaine

result.eng: Indeed, there are still some unanswered questions, expecially those about building seven.
